title: Chhoti Dudhi (Euphorbia thymifolia) -
description: Chhoti Dudhi (Euphorbia thymifolia) is an Ayurvedic herb and it is commonly known as Asthma Plant. It is commonly used in the treatment of bronchitis, dysentery, diarrhea, conjunctivitis, boils, worm infestation, ringworm, asthma, etc.
